articles.content: The major browser makers Apple, Google, Microsoft and Mozilla are working together "to advance a common browser extension platform." This newly formed WebExtensions Community Group explained what it … [+695 chars]

articles.title: Rise in adolescent Covid hospitalizations is reflection of new variants, Gottlieb says - CNBC
articles.description: Dr. Scott Gottlieb pointed to the Covid-19 variants as a potential cause behind an increase in adolescents being hospitalized with the virus.
articles.content:
Dr. Scott Gottlieb pointed on Friday to the highly transmissible Covid-19 variants as a potential cause behind an increase in adolescents being hospitalized with the virus in March and April.

articles.title: Microsoft Excel is now an esport – yes, you read that right - Dexerto
articles.description: The humble spreadsheet software isn’t just for taxes and tracking expenses anymore, now it’s being touted as the next big esport. No, we’re not kidding.
articles.content:
Microsoft’s humble spreadsheet software Excel is now an esport. No, this isn’t an out of season April Fool’s joke, either.
